info.title: HCP Terraform API v2
info.description: OpenAPI Specification for the HCP Terraform API V2

tags.name: feature-sets
tags.description: Feature set actions representing different pricing plans

tags.name: organization-memberships
tags.description: Organization membership management, including inviting and removing members

tags.name: vcs
tags.description: Operations related to VCS repositories and files

get.description: Get your account details

schema.description:
User resource representing the account details of the authenticated user.
For internal reasons, HCP Terraform associates team and organization tokens
with a synthetic user account called service user.

patch.description: Update your username and email address

get.description: Get details of a specific HCP organization
Lists the feature sets available in HCP Terraform. Returns feature sets that are active, current, and public.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: The page number to request. If omitted, the endpoint will return the first page.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: The number of feature sets per page. If omitted, the endpoint will return 20 feature sets per page.

get.description: Lists the feature sets a particular organization is eligible to access.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: The page number to request. If omitted, the endpoint will return the first page.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: The number of feature sets per page. If omitted, the endpoint will return 20 feature sets per page.

200.description: Successfully retrieved feature sets for the organization

post.description: Create an agent pool for an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Name of the organization

get.description: List agent pools, their agents, and their tokens for an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Name of the organization

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: If omitted, the endpoint will return the first page.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: If omitted, the endpoint will return 20 agents per page.

parameters.name: filter[allowed-workspaces][name]
parameters.description: Filters agent pools to those associated with the given workspace. The workspace must have permission to use the agent pool.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A search query string. Agent pools are searchable by name.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Allows sorting the returned agents pools. Valid values are "name" and "created-at". Prepending a hyphen to the sort parameter will reverse the order (e.g. "-name").

get.description: Get details about an agent pool

parameters.name: agent_pool_id
parameters.description: Agent Pool ID

parameters.name: agent_pool_id
parameters.description: Agent Pool ID

parameters.name: agent_pool_id
parameters.description: Agent Pool ID

get.description: List all agents in the specified agent pool.

parameters.name: agent_pool_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Agent Pool to list.

parameters.name: filter[last-ping-since]
parameters.description: Accepts a date in ISO8601 format (ex. `2020-08-11T10:41:23Z`).

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: If omitted, the endpoint will return the first page.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: If omitted, the endpoint will return 20 agents per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Allows sorting the returned agents. Valid value is "created-at". Prepending a hyphen to the sort parameter will reverse the order (e.g. "-name").

default.description: Agent Pool not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

get.description: Get details about an agent

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: Agent ID

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: Agent ID

get.description: List organizations.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Optionally side-load relationships of the specified name

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A search query string. Organizations are searchable by name and notification email.

parameters.name: q[email]
parameters.description: A search query string. This query searches organizations by notification email.

parameters.name: q[name]
parameters.description: A search query string. This query searches organizations by name.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Defaults to the first page, if omitted when `page[size]` is provided.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Defaults to 20 organizations per page, if omitted when `page[number]` is provided.

get.description: Get details about an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Organization Name

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Optionally side-load relationships of the specified name

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Organization Name

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Organization Name

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Organization Name

get.description: List all memberships in an organization. This includes both active members and invited users who have not yet accepted their invitation.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization to list memberships for

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A search query string. Memberships are searchable by user name or email (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: filter[status]
parameters.description: Filter memberships by status. Can be "active" or "invited".

parameters.name: filter[email]
parameters.description: Filter memberships by exact email address match.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Optionally side-load relationships. Can include "user" or "teams".

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: If omitted, the endpoint will return the first page.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: If omitted, the endpoint will return 20 memberships per page.

404.description: Organization not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

post.summary: Invite a User to an Organization
post.description: Invite a user to join an organization. Users can be invited by email address.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization the user will be invited to join

email.description: The email address of the user to be invited

teams.description: A list of teams the invited user will be a member of. All users must be added to at least one team.

inviteUser.summary: Invite a user to an organization with team memberships

400.description: Unable to invite user due to organization limits

404.description: Organization not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

422.description: Unable to invite user due to validation errors (e.g., invalid email, missing teams)

get.description: List all organization memberships for the currently authenticated user.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Optionally side-load relationships. Can include "user", "teams", or "organization".

get.description: Get details about a specific organization membership.

parameters.name: organization_membership_id
parameters.description: The organization membership ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Optionally side-load relationships. Can include "user" or "teams".

404.description: Organization membership not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

delete.description: Remove a user from an organization. You cannot remove yourself from organizations which you own.

parameters.name: organization_membership_id
parameters.description: The organization membership ID

204.description: Successfully removed the user from the organization

403.description: Unable to remove the user. You cannot remove yourself from organizations which you own.

404.description: Organization membership not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

get.description: List all projects in an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Page number for pagination.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Page size for pagination.

parameters.name: filter[names]
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of project names to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[permissions][create-workspace]
parameters.description: If present, returns a list of projects that the authenticated user can create workspaces in.

parameters.name: filter[permissions][update]
parameters.description: If present, returns a list of projects that the authenticated user can update.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Optional. Allows sorting the organization's projects by "name". Prepending a hyphen to the sort parameter reverses the order. For example, "-name" sorts by name in reverse alphabetical order. If omitted, the default sort order is arbitrary but stable.

post.description: Create a new project in an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization.

get.description: Get details of a specific project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project.

post.description: Move one or more workspaces into a project. You must have permission to move workspaces on the destination project as well as any source project(s). If you are not authorized to move any of the workspaces in the request, or if any workspaces in the request are not found, then no workspaces will be moved.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the destination project.

get.description: Get list of queries for a particular workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: The id of the workspace.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Page number for pagination.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Page size for pagination.

get.summary: List All Variables Accessible to a Workspace
get.description: This API returns the list of all variables that are accessible to a workspace. This includes variables defined directly on the workspace as well as variables inherited from any variable sets attached to the workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: The external ID of the workspace.

200.description: List of all variables accessible to a workspace

get.description: List all resources in a workspace's current state.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace to retrieve resources from.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Optional search query to filter resources by address pattern.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Optional sort parameter. Allows sorting workspace resources by name, nameIndex, provider,  providerType, module, or updatedAt. Format is "field:order" where order is "asc" or "desc".

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. If omitted, returns the first page.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Number of resources per page. If omitted, returns 20 resources per page.

404.description: Workspace not found or user unauthorized to perform action

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Workspace ID

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Organization Name

parameters.name: filter[operation]
parameters.description: Filter by run operation.

parameters.name: filter[status]
parameters.description: Filter by run status.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Page number.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Page size.

get.description: Get details about a run.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: Run ID

get.description: Get details of a specific configuration version.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: The ID of the run

get.description: Generate a temporary URL to download the configuration version files.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: The ID of the run.

Location.description: Storage URL to .tar.gz file containing the configuration version

post.description: Apply a run that is paused waiting for confirmation.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: Run ID

409.description: Run was not paused for confirmation; apply not allowed.

get.description: List all runs in a workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Workspace ID

parameters.name: filter[operation]
parameters.description: Filter by run operation.

parameters.name: filter[status]
parameters.description: Filter by run status.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Page number.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Page size.

get.description: List all runs in an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Organization name

parameters.name: filter[operation]
parameters.description: Filter by run operation.

parameters.name: filter[status]
parameters.description: Filter by run status.

parameters.name: filter[timeframe]
parameters.description: Filter by timeframe. Must be a numeric year or "year" for the last 12 months (the default).

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Page number.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Page size.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the plan to show.

get.description: This endpoint returns a specific plan by its ID.

This endpoint generates a temporary authenticated URL to the location of the JSON formatted execution plan.
When successful, this endpoint responds with a temporary redirect that should be followed.

This endpoint is available for plans using Terraform 0.12 and later.
The temporary URL has a life of 1 minute and should not be relied upon beyond the initial request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the plan to show.

204.description: Plan JSON supported, but plan has not yet completed.

307.description: Plan JSON found and temporary download URL generated.

Location.description: Temporary URL to download the JSON output

422.description: Plan does not use a supported version of Terraform (< 0.12.X).

get.summary: Get the JSON provider schema corresponding to a plan
get.description:
This endpoint generates a temporary authenticated URL to the location of the JSON formatted provider schema.
When successful, this endpoint responds with a temporary redirect that should be followed.

This endpoint is available for plans using Terraform 0.12 and later.
The temporary URL has a life of 1 minute and should not be relied upon beyond the initial request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the plan to show.

204.description: Plan JSON supported, but plan has not yet completed.

307.description: Plan JSON found and temporary download URL generated.

Location.description: Temporary URL to download the JSON schema output

422.description: Plan does not use a supported version of Terraform (< 0.12.X).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the run whose plan you want to get.

get.summary: Get a plan by Run ID
get.description: This endpoint returns a specific plan by its run ID.

get.summary: Get the JSON execution plan by Run ID
get.description:
This endpoint generates a temporary authenticated URL to the location of the JSON formatted execution plan.
When successful, this endpoint responds with a temporary redirect that should be followed.

This endpoint is available for plans using Terraform 0.12 and later.
The temporary URL has a life of 1 minute and should not be relied upon beyond the initial request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the run whose plan json you want to get.

204.description: Plan JSON supported, but plan has not yet completed.

307.description: Plan JSON found and temporary download URL generated.

Location.description: Temporary URL to download the JSON output

422.description: Plan does not use a supported version of Terraform (< 0.12.X).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the apply to show.

default.description: Apply not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

get.summary: Recover a failed state upload after applying

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the apply to recover state for.

307.description: Errored state available and user is authorized to read it

Location.description: Storage URL to raw state file

default.description: Apply not found, errored state not uploaded, or user unauthorized to perform action

get.summary: List Team Tokens for an Organization
get.description: List all tokens for a specified organization

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Organization Name

get.description: List teams in an organization. Any member of an organization can view visible teams and any secret teams they are a member of.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Name of the organization

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A search query string. Teams are searchable by name (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: filter[names]
parameters.description: If specified, restricts results to a team with a matching name. If multiple comma separated values are specified, teams matching any of the names are returned.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Optionally side-load relationships. Can include "users" or "organization-memberships".

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: If omitted, the endpoint will return the first page.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: If omitted, the endpoint will return 20 teams per page.

404.description: Organization not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

post.description: Create a team in an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Name of the organization

404.description: Organization not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

422.description: Malformed request body (missing attributes, wrong types, etc.)

get.description: Get details about a team.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: Team ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Optionally side-load relationships. Can include "users" or "organization-memberships".

404.description: Team not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: Team ID

404.description: Team not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

422.description: Malformed request body (missing attributes, wrong types, etc.)

delete.description: Delete a team. Only organization owners can delete teams.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: Team ID

404.description: Team not found, or user unauthorized to perform action

get.description: List configuration versions for a workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Defaults to the first page if omitted.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Defaults to 20 configuration versions per page if omitted.

post.description: Create a new configuration version in a workspace.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace.

get.description: Get details of a specific configuration version.

parameters.name: configuration_version_id
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration version.

get.description: Get commit information for a configuration version.

parameters.name: configuration_version_id
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration version.

post.description: Archive the uploaded files for a configuration version.

parameters.name: configuration_version_id
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration version.

409.description: Configuration version was in a non-archivable state or the configuration version was created with VCS and cannot be archived through the API.

get.description: Generate a temporary URL to download the configuration version files.

parameters.name: configuration_version_id
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration version.

Location.description: Storage URL to .tar.gz file containing the configuration version

get.description:
This endpoint returns a list of directories in a repository 
at the root or at a specific reference (branch, tag, or commit SHA).
Note: This endpoint only returns directories, not files.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization

parameters.name: oauth_token_id
parameters.description: The OAuth token ID to authenticate with the VCS provider

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The repository identifier (e.g., "owner/repo")

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description:
The branch, tag, or commit SHA to list directories for. 
If not provided, the default branch will be used.

parameters.name: githubAppInstallationId
parameters.description: The GitHub App installation ID (only needed when using GitHub App authentication)

404.description: Repository not found or user doesn't have access

get.description: This endpoint checks if a repository exists and is accessible to the user.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization

parameters.name: oauth_token_id
parameters.description: The OAuth token ID to authenticate with the VCS provider

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The repository identifier (e.g., "owner/repo")

id.description: An identifier for the repository check (typically the repository identifier)

exists.description: Whether the repository exists and is accessible

identifier.description: The repository identifier that was checked

404.description: OAuth token not found or user doesn't have access

get.summary: Check if a module name and provider combination is available
get.description:
This endpoint checks if a module name and provider combination is available for use within an organization.
It returns a validation result indicating whether the name is already in use.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the organization

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the module to validate

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The provider of the module to validate

200.description: Successfully validated the module name and provider

id.description: A unique identifier for this validation result

module-name.description: The module name that was validated

provider-name.description: The provider name that was validated

valid.description: Whether the module name and provider combination is available

is-service-account.description: Indicates whether this user is a synthetic user representing a team or organization.

current_password.description: The user's current password. Unlike most API dataattributes, this one uses underscore_case instead of kebab-case.

password_confirmation.description: The confirmation of the user's new password. Unlike most API data attributes, this one uses underscore_case instead of kebab-case.

id.description: The external ID of the feature set

assessments.description: Whether the feature set includes assessments

audit-logging.description: Whether the feature set includes audit logging

can-self-service-downgrade.description: Whether the organization can self-service downgrade from this feature set

change-requests.description: Whether the feature set includes change requests

concurrency-override.description: Whether concurrency can be overridden for this feature set

cost.description: The cost of the feature set in cents

cost-estimation.description: Whether the feature set includes cost estimation

default-agents-ceiling.description: Default maximum number of concurrent agents

default-runs-ceiling.description: Default maximum number of concurrent runs

global-run-tasks.description: Whether the feature set includes global run tasks

hyok.description: Whether the feature set includes Hold Your Own Key encryption

identifier.description: Unique identifier for the feature set

invoke-terraform-action.description: Whether the feature set includes action invocations

is-current.description: Whether this is a current/active feature set

is-free-tier.description: Whether this is a free tier feature set

is-managed-resource-plan.description: Whether this is a managed resource plan

module-deprecations.description: Whether this feature set includes module deprecations

module-revocations.description: Whether this feature set includes module revocations

module-tests-generation.description: Whether the feature set includes module test generation

no-code-modules.description: Whether the feature set includes no-code modules

policy-enforcement.description: Whether the feature set includes policy enforcement

policy-limit.description: Maximum number of policies (null means unlimited)

policy-mandatory-enforcement-limit.description: Maximum number of mandatory enforcement policies (null means unlimited)

policy-set-limit.description: Maximum number of policy sets (null means unlimited)

private-networking.description: Whether the feature set includes private networking

private-policy-agents.description: Whether the feature set includes private policy agents

private-run-tasks.description: Whether the feature set includes private run tasks

private-vcs.description: Whether the feature set includes private VCS

run-task-limit.description: Maximum number of run tasks (null means unlimited)

run-task-mandatory-enforcement-limit.description: Maximum number of mandatory enforcement run tasks (null means unlimited)

run-task-workspace-limit.description: Maximum number of workspaces per run task (null means unlimited)

run-tasks.description: Whether the feature set includes run tasks

self-serve-billing.description: Whether the feature set supports self-serve billing

sentinel.description: Whether the feature set includes Sentinel (alias for policy-enforcement)

sso.description: Whether the feature set includes SSO

stacks.description: Whether the feature set includes stacks

teams.description: Whether the feature set includes teams

user-limit.description: Maximum number of users (null means unlimited)

uses-hcp-rum-billing-resource.description: Whether the feature set uses HCP RUM billing resource

versioned-policy-set-limit.description: Maximum number of versioned policy sets (null means unlimited)

status.description: The status of the organization membership. Can be "active" or "invited".

email.description: The email address of the user.

created-at.description: The timestamp when the organization membership was created.

is-org-two-factor-required.description: Whether two-factor authentication is required for the organization. Only present for invited users.

teams.description: The teams this user is a member of. Only shows teams the requesting user has access to, and teams that are not "secret" (unless the requester is a member).

user.description: The user associated with this organization membership.

organization.description: The organization this membership belongs to.

name.description: The name of the team, which can only include letters, numbers, `-`, and `_`.

users-count.description: The number of active users in the team.

description.description: Team description. Only available when effective permissions are enabled for unified organizations.

sso-team-id.description: The unique identifier of the team from the SAML MemberOf attribute.

visibility.description: The team's visibility. Can be "secret" or "organization" (visible).

allow-member-token-management.description: Whether team members are allowed to manage their own authentication tokens.

hcp-resource-name.description: The HCP resource name for unified teams.

is-unified.description: Whether this team is unified with HCP.

non-service-users-count.description: The number of non-service account users in the team.

permissions.description: Permissions for the current user on this team.

organization-access.description: Settings for the team's organization-level permissions.

id.description: The external ID of the workspace resource

address.description: The full address of the resource in Terraform configuration

created-at.description: The timestamp when the resource was first created

updated-at.description: The timestamp when the resource was last updated

module.description: The module name where the resource is defined (e.g., "root" for root module)

provider-type.description: The resource type from the provider (e.g., "random_pet")

modified-by-state-version-id.description: The external ID of the state version that last modified this resource

name-index.description: The index of the resource when there are multiple instances with the same name

execution-details.description: Details about the execution of this plan. Null if plan has not started.

agent-id.description: ID of the agent used for this run (when mode is agent)

agent-name.description: Name of the agent used for this run (when mode is agent)

agent-pool-id.description: ID of the agent pool used for this run (when mode is agent)

agent-pool-name.description: Name of the agent pool used for this run (when mode is agent)

generated-configuration.description: Whether the plan generated new configuration as part of this run

has-changes.description: Whether the plan has any changes

resource-additions.description: Number of resources that will be added

resource-changes.description: Number of resources that will be changed

resource-destructions.description: Number of resources that will be destroyed

resource-imports.description: Number of resources that will be imported

structured-run-output-enabled.description: Whether structured run output is enabled

status-timestamps.description: Timestamps for state transitions of the plan

log-read-url.description: URL to read the logs for this plan

is-exportable.description: Whether the plan can be exported

permissions.description: Permissions for the current user related to this plan

can-export.description: Whether the current user can export the plan

state-versions.description: State versions associated with this plan (for TF <= 0.8)

json-output.description: API URL for the JSON formatted execution plan (available for Terraform 0.12+)

json-output-redacted.description: API URL for the redacted JSON formatted execution plan (available for Terraform 0.15.2+)

json-schema.description: API URL for the JSON schema of this plan (available for Terraform 0.12+)
